name: Sands of Ruin Adventure
description:
Sands of Ruin Adventure is a thrilling third person adventure game not meant for the faint of heart of folks with an allergic symptom for adventure. You, are Eric, an unwitting casual business executive suddenly finding yourself on a perilous journey. 

The keys to play this game...

WASD to move around

mouse to look around

E & F to interact with objects such as doors and keys
